channel.title: It's War
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd111/manofwar012/ItsWar.png[/img]
This was my first time using pen tool (around the arm) so let me know how I can work on that. I wanted to change my style a bit this time, before I had just been basically putting things in random places, which makes terrible tags. This time, I actually thought of where I wanted to put things.
I haven't made a tag in several months so this was getting me back into graphics.
Rate and Comment

item.title: It's War
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

The colours should be a bit more vivid and the gun should stand out more.

Read full topic

item.title: It's War
item.dc:creator: @_rezzy »rezzy.
item.description:
@_rezzy wrote:

I advise depth in this, as you can see it may look like it’s shooting to the left, but it’s shooting a bit forward. Add sharpening to the front sides, but not too much, or you can use dodge/burn tool, or other ways.

Read full topic

item.title: It's War
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

text isn’t really noticeable, and yeah, the gun needs more emphasis i think. possibly clean up the area around his head too

Read full topic

I wanted to change my style a bit this time, before I had just been basically putting things in random places, which makes terrible tags. This time, I actually thought of where I wanted to put things.

Rate and Comment[/quote]Make the gun look more realistic. Other than that, I like it. 9/10
